__e: Well, Detective Beckett, it's been a true pleasure.
I'm Detective Kate Beckett. I'd like to ask you a few questions, if that's okay.
So Beckett said, with enough time, you might be able to recover prints.
These are calls Beckett made to your number.
If Beckett's case has anything to do with this base, well, then she's into something way bigger than she realizes.
- Until Dr. Beckett can clear you, there's nothing I can do.
There's nothing going on with Beckett and me. No more than there was yesterday.
Well, what Beckett and I have cannot be rehearsed.
And if I'm so useless, why would Beckett ask me to consult on a murder?
